original_text: They will become very small dust over the whole country of Egypt. The dust will cause boils to appear on the skin of people and animals. It will happen all over Egypt.’
korean_text: 그 재가 애굽 온 땅의 티끌이 되어 애굽 온 땅의 사람과 짐승에게 붙어서 악성 종기가 생기리라

sentences.original_text: They will become very small dust
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 매우 작은 먼지가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: over the whole country of Egypt
The dust will cause boils to appear
sentences.korean_translation: 그 먼지는 종기가 나게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: on the skin of people and animals
It will happen all over Egypt
